name: Random Chimp Event (we are everywhere)
description:
the plug - https://www.youtube.com/@weareeverywhere

Game I made a long time ago WASD - Move
R - Reload
Click - Shoot Banana Tree Mode adds Banana Trees You can set the Monkey Spawner time, and the time it takes for the Monkey Spawner to reduce its time. Eventually the monkeys will be spawning every second.
